WorkItem.Description:
When you are not busy:) perhaps you would consider a one click function to lock the gemming, enchants, reforges, etc. of the all the currently equipped gear.
 
For example I get my gear rigged for the bear. I would like to lock all these specific items so Rawr won't try to change the bear gear gems, enchants, etc when I optimize for cat. Currently I can do this by marking each equipped item with a blue diamond and clearing the diamonds for all the alternatives. 
 
This is a lot of clicking and is error prone. Doing all this with a single click would be nice.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] One click "lock" for current gear enchants, gems

Comments.Message: Where do people get the idea that Rawr is in caps? :/

It shouldn't be all that difficult to do this without a one click button. Go to the Equipped > Gear chart, undo the green diamonds, mark blue ones.

And isn't the core concept of what you are actually trying to accomplish built in to the Progressive Optimizer of Batch Tools? I think that makes this unnecessary.
Declined, this can be done simply enough manually and the root action isn't done this same way when using the Batch Tools (its already part of that process for item consideration).
